messages.title: Labour Will Deliver More Police On the Beat for Our Area
messages.content: Since 2010, the Lib Dems and the Tories have cut the police force in our area by over 20,000 officers. Labour will deliver another 10,000 police officers to fight crime effectively.

messages.title: Our National Health Service in Danger
messages.content: King's College Hospital in serious financial difficulty following Tory and Lib Dem cuts.

messages.title: The Tories want to cut the funding to every single primary and secondary school in our area
messages.content: Labour will give our schools the greatest possible protection against Tory cuts to ensure all our children get the best education possible.

messages.title: Vote Helen Hayes to Stop the Tories' Hard Brexit
messages.content: Labour's Helen Hayes voted against triggering Article 50 in Parliament on every single occasion.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will deliver another 10,000 police officers to fight crime effectively.
Labour will give our NHS the resources it needs, free at the point of use and fit for the future.
Campaign to stop the Tory cuts of almost £1,000 per pupil at every local school.
Campaign for new homes to be built and fight for a fairer deal for renters.

issues.brexitEurope: Labour's Helen Hayes voted against triggering Article 50 in Parliament on every single occasion.

leaflet.personalStatement:
It has been a privilege to serve as your Labour MP for the past 2 years.
Both locally and nationally, the Tories and the Lib Dems are forcing a Tory Hard Brexit.

endorsements.endorsement: Helen Hayes is a great local MP and I'm more than happy to vote for her.

quotes.text: I will keep fighting to stop the Tories from damaging our local schools.

images.caption: Helen Hayes at East Dulwich Police Station
Helen Hayes at King's College Hospital
Helen Hayes fighting for fair funding for all our schools
Helen Hayes campaigning to stop the Royal Mail Private Postal Service
